archimate:Requirement.name: R8.3.1 Standard way of reviewing and approving new standards based on aspects
archimate:Requirement.documentation: U26 As a developer I need to understand the impact of taking on new standards to the development work so we don't overcommit resources within S&C U27 As a developer I need to understand the impact of taking on new standards to the organization so we don't overcommit resources with Tietoevry Connect
